question: How often will we get reports or updates?
answer: We will provide your report on the progress of your project on a regular basis. You have the flexibility to adjust any of our strategies as needed. We ensure open communication to keep you informed.

question: What is your pricing model? Monthly or project-based?
answer: Our pricing is flexible to suit your needs. We offer both monthly retainers and project-based options. Whether you prefer ongoing support or a one-time campaign, we will customize our pricing models that fit your project’s demand and budget.

question: Will I own the assets (website, ads, creatives)?
answer: You will fully own all digital assets of your business. This may include websites, ad accounts, creative content, and analytics data. We ensure you will have complete access and control from day one, so your brand’s valuable data always remains yours.

question: Can you audit my existing marketing efforts before we start?
answer: Yes, we absolutely can audit your existing marketing efforts before starting. We will first check your current digital marketing activities and status. This result will help us to customize a personalized plan for your business. We will let you know your brand’s strengths, gaps, and opportunities for improvement.

question: Can I access real-time analytics or ad spend details?
answer: Yes, you can access real-time analytics and ad spend details through integrated dashboards. We also offer detailed reporting tools where you will be able to monitor performance, traffic, engagement, and budget usage.

question: How do you handle data privacy and security?
answer: We prioritize the privacy and security of your data. Our agency adheres to all industry-standard data protection regulations and best practices. We never share client data without explicit permission and have strict security measures in place to prevent unauthorized access.
